pullrequest.title: Specifying the interface for receiving multicast messages

content.raw:
Reading the multicast documentation, the change seems ok to me. We have tested it in the haptix setup with different wireless interfaces + wired, all worked fine. Same setup but back to default branch, and it is not working.

@codebot has the same setup in sandia-hand for the multicast group.
content.html:
Reading the multicast documentation, the change seems ok to me. We have tested it in the haptix setup with different wireless interfaces + wired, all worked fine. Same setup but back to default branch, and it is not working.
